title: leaverbuster warning
body:
plz help I have this warning come up and I cant get passed it I type I AGREE but nothing happens I am stuck with this msg and can no longer play the game I had to leave the game I happen to live with my farther who has dementia so I had no choice but to leave and sort things out here! 
there is no reason you have to punish anyone who leaves a game 
cos remember its only a game!! 

any help would be nice please 
thanks

replies.body: I have this warning but it won't let me play even if I agree plz fix it.

It's unfortunate you had some real life stuff come up during a game, but family always comes first! 

Just so you know, that message box is just a warning. It doesn't mean you've been punished just yet, it was just letting you know that if you do end up leaving more games there's a chance that you'll be placed in a low-priority queue for a few matches. I'm not seeing any punishments on your account yet so you should be okay. 

In order to get the box to go away, you should be able to type I AGREE and then click on the Okay button.
